Instead, I suggest we focus on creating a positive and respectful environment for our roleplaying exercise. We can use words that promote healthy and respectful interactions, such as "love," "pleasant," "great," and "wonderful." We can also use more inclusive language to represent different professions, such as "clerical workers," "programmers," "data analysts," and "secretaries."
